title: Dried Fruit and Nuts on Pear Shaped Serving Tray
features: Delectable dried fruit including plenty of pears, apricots, apples, kiwi, plums and Montmorency cherries are accompanied by butter toffee pecans and presented on a beautiful pear-shaped bamboo cutting board.
Crunchy butter toffee pecans, make the perfect accompaniment to dried fruit
Arranged on a reusable bamboo tray.
See alternate image for Instruction on how to include A GIFT MESSAGE. Be sure to sign your name and/or your company, so your recipient knows who to thank
description: Delectable dried fruit including plenty of pears, apricots, apples, kiwi, plums and Montmorency cherries are accompanied by butter toffee pecans and presented on a beautiful pear-shaped bamboo cutting board. Send as a whole Christmas gift, for birthday or for any occasion.
